# Changelog

All Notable changes to `spatie/html-element` will be documented in this file

## 1.1.1 - 2018-12-26
- Fixed: Escape attribute values

## 1.1.0 - 2018-11-21
- Added: Implicit `div` tags like Emmet (e.g. `.foo` -> `<div class="foo">`)

## 1.0.1 - 2017-03-13
- Fixed: Allow `0` as an attribute value

## 1.0.0 - 2016-03-11
- First release
